Posts.Content: Hi Penny, I had a core biopsy when I was recalled for a second mamogramme. I was told that there was a concern about my mamogramme and that a core biopsy was needed to find out if it was breast cancer. I know how it feels to be waiting for results, I waited 10 days. I can't say anything that will stop you worrying, but I'm thinking of you and hoping that things go well for you. Liz.
Posts.Title: worried

Posts.Content: Hi Debbie,just been catching up with things as not been on site lately. Glad to hear it all went well and you weren't too sore. I hope your results are good next monday. Liz.
Posts.Title: WHY AXILLARY CLEARNCE ????

Posts.Content: Hi there, had surgery last November, mastectomy and LD reconstruction. Still having seroma on back drained, it feels like its never going to end. How long is it likely to go on for? Liz.
Posts.Title: seroma following LD reconstruction

Posts.Content: Hi Jules, thanks for your reply. Trying to stay upbeat, 3 months postop now so hopefully it will resolve soon. Thanks again. Liz.
Posts.Title: seroma following LD reconstruction

Posts.Content: Hi Cheryl, thanks for your reply. Sorry to hear that you were so ill after your op. Liz.
